title: Port Royale 4: Extended Edition – v1.6.0.21040 + 2 DLC + Bonus Soundtrack + Windows 7 Fix
body:
Port Royale 4: Extended Edition – v1.6.0.21040 + 2 DLC + Bonus Soundtrack + Windows 7 Fix


Genres/Tags: Managerial, Strategy, Isometric, 3D, Real-time
Companies: Gaming Minds Studios, Kalypso Media
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI11
Original Size: 7.3 GB
Repack Size: from 4.8 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Port.Royale.4.Buccaneers-CODEX ISO release: codex-port.royale.4.buccaneers.iso (7,696,056,320 bytes)
  • Missing localizations and bonus OST in MP3 format added
  • Game version: v1.6.0.21040; Extended Edition Bonus Content and Buccaneers DLCs are included and activated, as well as bonus soundtrack in MP3 format
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (ONLY when installed with ALL components!)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of credits/intro videos, bonus soundtrack and voiceovers you don’t need
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 7.3 to 4.8~5.5 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 7-12 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 7.3 GB
  • Use BAT-files in game root to change the game language
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • To play the game on Windows 7, run “Fix XINPUT1_4.dll error.bat” in game root or copy “C:\Windows\System32\xinput1_3.dll” to game’s folder as “xinput1_4.dll”

Game Description

Set sail and join the colonial powers of Spain, England, France and the Netherlands in their fight for supremacy of the Caribbean in the 17th century.

In ‘Port Royale 4’ you will take control of a colony as a young and ambitious governor who is eager to learn what it takes to manage and grow his small settlement into a bustling trader city.

Develop production chains connecting multiple islands and create complex trade routes across the Caribbean, covering the ever-growing needs of the respective cities. Make use of the detailed sea map to avoid stormy weather regions, cliffs or shallow waters. Fulfill tasks for your nation’s viceroy, earning more fame to unlock town buildings, ships and more. Conquer the cities of rival nations or hunt down their fleets with a letter of marque while also keeping a keen eye out for pirates and other privateers.

You can skip downloading of of credits/intro videos, bonus soundtrack and voiceovers you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-selective-english.bin (REQUIRED for all languages w/o their own voicepack)
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin
  • fg-optional-bonus-soundtrack.bin
  • fg-optional-credits.bin (also contains intro trailer)

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective/optional” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-05).
